title: LIV's Lawsuit
description:
Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon discuss their thoughts on Brittney Griner being sentenced to 9 years in Russian prison, what will come of the lawsuit against the PGA Tour by LIV Tour golfers and the proposal to move bowl games to the beginning of the college football season. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: PTI: Brittney Griner is sentenced to 9 years in Russian prison and LIV Tour golfers are suing the PGA Tour.
